locale.text:
Your copy should address 3 key questions: Who am I writing for? (Audience) Why should they care? (Benefit) What do I want them to do here? (Call-to-Action)


Create a great offer by adding words like "free" "personalized" "complimentary" or "customized." A sense of urgency often helps readers take an action, so think about inserting phrases like "for a limited time only" or "only 7 remaining"!
locale.bullets:
• Bullet 1
  • Bullet 2
  • Bullet 3 Be sure to make the articles short and concise as people tend not to read much more than a couple of paragraphs.
locale.heading: A direct and compelling headline
locale.articleText:
Place article copy here. Be sure to make the articles short and concise as people tend not to read much more than a couple of paragraphs. Place article copy here.


Text Link
locale.couponText:
Be sure to enter code

[SALE] at checkout to save!
locale.nonDeletableText: Non-deleteable Headline Block in a Non-deletable Layout
locale.pollHeading: Is the content of this email relevant to you?
locale.ecommerceDescriptionText: Click anywhere to grab a product from your store. No store yet? Create one by clicking in this space.

heading.label: Heading
heading.description: One column layout with single text block styled as a top level heading

sectionHeading.label: Section Heading
sectionHeading.description: One column layout with full width background color with single text block styled as a top level heading

article.label: Article
article.description: Two column block with two text blocks (article heading text and article body text) in the left column and one image block in the right column

feature.label: Feature Article
feature.description: Two column block with background color that only goes to the outer margins of the row with two text blocks (feature heading text and feature body text) in the left column and one image block in the right column

articleBorder.label: Article with Border
articleBorder.description: Two column block with a border that goes around both columns and with two text blocks (article heading text and article body text) in the left column and one image block in the right column

featureSplit.label: Split Column Feature
featureSplit.description: Two column layout with a background color behind each column and a gap between them with an image block and text block stacked in each column

threeColumn.label: Three Column
threeColumn.description: Three column layout with an image block and text block stacked in each column

coupon.label: Coupon
coupon.description: Two column layout with dashed border around both columns. Left column contains one text block styled as a top level heading and the right column contains a text block and button block.
